roleset.name: use too much

example.name: passive
example.text: Editorials in the Greenville newspaper allowed that Mrs. Yeargin was wrong, but also said the case showed how testing-1 was being overused *trace*-1.

roleset.note: OVERUSE-V NOTES: This example feels more adjectival to me, but hey, that's life. (from overuse.01-v)
